all_characters.name: Iron Man
all_characters.long_description: After being held captive by terrorists, billionaire engineer Tony Stark builds a weaponized suit of armor to fight evil
all_characters.short_description: Billionaire Tony Stark who builds a suit of armour to fight the bad guys

all_characters.name: Captain America
all_characters.long_description: Steve Rogers is a man who was enhanced by an experimental serum by the US Government during WW2. Towards the end of the war, he was trapped in ice and survived in suspended animation until he was revived present day. He is a leader in the Avengers.
all_characters.short_description: Steve Rogers, enhanced to human perfection, serves his country

all_characters.name: Black Widow
all_characters.long_description: Black widow is a baller spy that began her training in Soviet Russia. She became a ballerina to cover her true identity. Ulitmately, she breaks her ties with Russia when they try to brain wash her and she becomes a part of the Avengers.
all_characters.short_description: Black Widow began is a baller spy

all_characters.name: Hulk
all_characters.long_description: Bruce Banner is a physicist who was exposed accidentally to gamma radiation during the detonation of an experimental bomb. As a result, he changes into the Incredible Hulk (huge, green and strong), when under emotional stress. His powers and strength capabilities are proportional to his emotional stress.
all_characters.short_description: Bruce Banner is both a physically weak physicist, and the incredible hulk

all_characters.name: Hawkeye
all_characters.long_description: Hawkeye began as a reluctant villian until he joined the Ranks of the Avengers as their beloved archer.
all_characters.short_description: Hawkeye is an archer who began as a villian, but became a hero in the Avengers

all_characters.name: Nick Fury
all_characters.long_description: Nick Fury made an impact in WW2 as the commander of the Howling Commandos. When the war ended he joined the CIA
all_characters.short_description: Nick Fury is the hero of early WW2
